page.title: 02The River Rib
page.content: There is different animal life in and around the river.Some of the animals are Water rats,Kingfishers, Frogs,Fish and Tadpoles.You used to be able to go fishing at the old watermill and catch fish about 7inches long.There was a pike as well.Then they made the mill-house bigger, with and a bridge and waterfall.Now the fish are starting to come back and they will hopefully be the same size as before so people can go fishing again. Pollution kills animals as well as fish, and that does not help.There is also a lot of litter,such as crisp packets,cans and sweet wrappers as well as oil.When there is a big flow some fish get washed away.
